text:
e="preserve">Gary Beach (October 10, 1947 – July 17, 2018) was an American actor and singer. He was born in Alexandria, Virginia. Beach was best known for the role of Roger De Bris in both the stage and movie productions of "The Producers". He won a Tony Award for Best Performance by a Featured Actor in a Musical and Drama Desk Award in 2001.
Beach died on July 17, 2018 in Palm Springs, California at the age of 70.

annotations.surface_form: Tony Award for Best Performance by a Featured Actor in a Musical
